languages.text: [Напасть] "Ваш рейд стоил мне целое состояние — таких потерь я не прощаю! Умри!"
[Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"
languages.original_text: [Напасть] "Ваш рейд стоил мне целое состояние — таких потерь я не прощаю! Умри!"

traits.locale_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"
[Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"
[Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"
[Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"
[Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

languages.text: [攻撃する]「貴様が襲撃したことで多大なる損害を被った。このような蛮行、見逃すわけにはいかない！死ね！」
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [攻撃する]「貴様が襲撃したことで多大なる損害を被った。このような蛮行、見逃すわけにはいかない！死ね！」

languages.text: [攻击]“你这场小小的袭击让我损失惨重，我绝不会容忍这样的损失！去死吧！”
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [攻击]“你这场小小的袭击让我损失惨重，我绝不会容忍这样的损失！去死吧！”

languages.text: [Atacar] «Esta incursión me ha costado una fortuna. ¡Y no perdono esta clase de pérdidas! ¡Muere!».
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [Atacar] «Esta incursión me ha costado una fortuna. ¡Y no perdono esta clase de pérdidas! ¡Muere!».

languages.text: [Attaquer] « Votre petit raid m'a coûté une fortune. Vous allez me le payer ! Préparez-vous à mourir ! »
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer] « Votre petit raid m'a coûté une fortune. Vous allez me le payer ! Préparez-vous à mourir ! »

languages.text: [Angreifen] "Euer kleiner Überfall hat mich ein Vermögen gekostet – solche Verluste verzeihe ich nicht! Sterbt!"
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [Angreifen] "Euer kleiner Überfall hat mich ein Vermögen gekostet – solche Verluste verzeihe ich nicht! Sterbt!"

languages.text: [Saldır] "Ufak saldırınız bir servete mal oldu. Bunu affetmeyeceğim! Öleceksin!"
languages.original_text: [Attack] "Your little raid has cost me a fortune — I do not forgive such losses! Die!"

traits.locale_text: [Saldır] "Ufak saldırınız bir servete mal oldu. Bunu affetmeyeceğim! Öleceksin!"
